features: PRIMER FOR LONG-LASTING MAKEUP: This e.l.f. primer transforms your face into a flawless, smooth canvas ideal for long-lasting makeup application.
HYDRATING FORMULA: The formula is infused with grape and vitamins A, C, & E to help boost complexion and hydrate your skin.
GREAT FOR ACNE-PRONE SKIN: Great for acne-prone, combination, and oily skin.
PERFECT PAIRING: Pair with the e.l.f. Flawless Finish Foundation or Camo Concealer for an all-day satin finish.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.
body.description: The perfect makeup starts with the perfect primer. Made with grape and Vitamins A, C, and E, our hydrating primer gives you a smooth, flawless canvas for long-lasting makeup application. Great for illuminating your skin and minimizing pores prior to applying cosmetics. elf Cosmetics offers a complete line of vegan and cruelty-free makeup and professional tools—all at an extraordinary value price, so there is sure to be something for everyone. See bullets and images for more information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've never used a face primer before my makeup application, but since I'm getting older, I could use all the help I could get. So I tried this brand. It really is good, I definetly noticed a difference In The way my face looks after my makeup application. My Face is smoother with a glow to it. I will always use primer now. I've also found I could just get by with the primer and a little blush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this primer!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried more primers than I care to admit, and that includes high dollar ones but this one puts them all to shame! It leaves my pores absolutely invisible, but doesn’t clog or cause breakouts. Your makeup will glide on so smoothly and leaves a nice matte finish that lasts all day! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good primer but doesn't do much to adjust tone
reviews.reviewText: I don't have rosacea, but my cheeks and nose are naturally a bit more red. I had seen ads for a high-end makeup line's green tone adjusting primer, but as I was checking Amazon to see if they carried that product noticed this one in the results. I decided to give the e.l.f. product a try, instead, because of the far better price tag.As a primer, it's great (as are most e.l.f. primers that I've tried), but it didn't do much to soften the redness on my face. The price tag really can't be beat, though, so I'll continue using it with another brand's specialty redness-correcting concealer under my foundation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product But Never Delivered
reviews.reviewText: was delivered to the wrong house. I just asked for a refund as this was the fourth package delivered to wrong address in a week. This is a great product and I ordered from Target and received in 3 days. Actually was a better deal there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes your skin super soft
reviews.reviewText: I don’t do makeup much so I wasn’t sure what kind of primer was best, but this one had really good reviews so I decided to try it. I’m very impressed! It makes your skin super soft and doesn’t feel like you put anything on your skin. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells like motor oil
reviews.reviewText: I bought this primer based on reviews and the description that it helped to smooth out large pores and was matte finish. I have oily skin with large pores on my nose. It does seem to help with the look of the pores and is lightweight and feels silky to the touch, so spreads nicely. BUT it smells like MOTOR OIL! Seriously. So, if you are averse to strong smells, this is NOT for you. The smell makes me wonder what kind of bad stuff is in this product so I don't know if I will continue to use it or not. And it really is not matte finish in my opinion - the shine, especially on my nose, is back after less than an hour of applying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super smooth face primer
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 to try and I love them both! Mineral Infused primer is like putting silk on your face! Your foundation glides on so smooth after, feels lovely and the tiniest bit covers so well. The Poreless primer is silky too, fills in the lines very nice and wakes up skin but does have that Tea Tree smell to get past initially. I honestly cannot decide which I love more, or which fills in my lines best so I am alternating and hope that's not a 'beauty mistake'. GREAT products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Imho This creates a silky smooth blurred finish! It is moisture rich not drying like others I have used and a little bit goes a long way… One pump for my entire face! The difference in make up application and duration is notable as there were a few mornings I forgot to put it on and I thought my make up looked horrible so I removed it and started over just so that I could use this product! I don't know what I did before I found it but I will keep using it!

The ELF Hydrating Face Primer is an absolute game-changer!I've tried various high-end primers, and this budget-friendly gem performs just as well, if not better. It effortlessly smooths out fine lines, creating a flawless base for makeup application. Comparable to Smashbox but at a fraction of the cost, this primer is a true steal. Its hydrating formula keeps my combination skin moisturized without feeling greasy, and it holds up throughout the day without the need for constant touch-ups. Lightweight and easy to apply, a little goes a long way. If you're on the lookout for a top-notch primer that won't break the bank, ELF has nailed it with this one – it's become a staple in my routine, and I can't recommend it enough!
Second time buying, feels like silk putting on and a great primer!! I have fairly sensitive skin and break out easily but have no issues with this
Para el tipo de piel seca es buenisimo, ya que te deja la piel suave y liso, definitivamente lo volvería a comprar, el maquillaje dura muchísimo y no se me cuartea como con otras pre bases

reviews.reviewerName: Hidrata muito e deixa a pele com um aspecto macio e viçoso.
Nunca había utilizado un producto para esto, pero funciona muy bien, soy muy sensible a los productos pero este no me ha dado reacción y funciona a la perfección para ll que es.
reviews.reviewText: Deja tu piel lisa sin ningún tipo de arruga y poro, ideal para un maquillaje perfecto.
